title: Episode #35: Hemingway’s Guns
description: Welcome back to another episode of the Art of Manliness podcast. In this week's episode we talk to Silvio Calabi, co-author of the book Hemingway's Guns. We discuss Ernest Hemingway's favorite firearms, how his love of guns influenced his writing, and what his favorite hunts were.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
